page.title: 14Electrical gadgets at home
page.content: {Most homes within the grid area {owned the following: 1.At least one colour{television.}Many families have a second black and white set as well. 2.{Video cassette recorder}-used mainly for showing hired film videos. 3.At least one radio. Mainly for local radio stations. 4.Automatic washing machine. 5.Vacuum cleaner 6.Toaster 7.Iron 8.Automatic kettle 9.Sewing machine 10.Record player When music is played it is on tape cassette recorders, often integral with the radio (see above) { 11.'fridge and freezer 12.Cooker {Minority owned items: } Micro wave cookers (increasing in nos) Home computers (increasing greatly) Dish washer (rare) Coffee maker (rare)
